unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever is ON!**
normalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever is ON!**

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Get your popcorn ready, ‘cause film festival season is kicking off BIG time. From the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival prepping its red carpet to whispers of a cool indie showcase happening in God's Own Country (Kerala, baby!), cinephiles are in for a treat.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Get your popcorn ready, ‘cause film festival season is kicking off BIG time. From the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival prepping its red carpet to whispers of a cool indie showcase happening in God's Own Country (Kerala, baby!), cinephiles are in for a treat.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that a bunch of talented filmmakers are sending their works to festivals internationally, hoping for that coveted Golden Leopard or whatever the shiny award is. Heard one short film, "Aloo Tikki Dreams," is already creating buzz.
normalised: Word on the street is that a bunch of talented filmmakers are sending their works to festivals internationally, hoping for that coveted Golden Leopard or whatever the shiny award is. Heard one short film, "Aloo Tikki Dreams," is already creating buzz.

unnormalised: Closer to home, the whispers surrounding the Kolkata International Film Festival are getting louder. They say it's going to be bigger and better than ever.
normalised: Closer to home, the whispers surrounding the Kolkata International Film Festival are getting louder. They say it's going to be bigger and better than ever.

unnormalised: Plus, what's a good festival without delicious food? Hopefully this year someone's serving up hot biryani to keep us going during those late-night screenings. Imagine watching a classic Satyajit Ray film while munching on spicy biryani... pure bliss! Remember to check out dates, submissions and award ceremonies soon! Happy viewing!
normalised: Plus, what's a good festival without delicious food? Hopefully this year someone's serving up hot biryani to keep us going during those late-night screenings. Imagine watching a classic Satyajit Ray film while munching on spicy biryani... pure bliss! Remember to check out dates, submissions and award ceremonies soon! Happy viewing!
